values.value: SELECT Id, Name, Industry, AnnualRevenue, Type, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingCountry, (SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, Email, Phone, Title, Department FROM Contacts ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 50), (SELECT Id, Name, StageName, Amount, CloseDate, Probability, Type FROM Opportunities WHERE IsClosed = false ORDER BY Amount DESC LIMIT 50), (SELECT Id, CaseNumber, Subject, Status, Priority, Origin, CreatedDate FROM Cases WHERE IsClosed = false ORDER BY CreatedDate DESC LIMIT 30), (SELECT Id, ContractNumber, Status, StartDate, EndDate FROM Contracts WHERE Status = 'Activated' LIMIT 20) FROM Account WHERE Type =: accountType ORDER BY AnnualRevenue DESC NULLS LAST
